description:
Nanoha leads a double life as an ordinary grade-schooler by day, and a mage by night. Feeling tired, she decides to take a day off from searching for Jewel Seeds, and goes to cheer on the soccer team coached by her father. Once again, she senses a Jewel Seed. Before calamity hits her neighborhood, Nanoha activates a new power of magic with her Raising Heart.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Machi wa Kiken de Ippai na no
The Town`s in a Lot of Danger?
街は危険でいっぱいなの?
